nodes.text: Contispex I was an individual that served as a chancellor who perished sometime prior to 10 BBY. In that year, Contispex's ashes were held in arks aboard the First Light, the personal star yacht of Crimson Dawn crime lord Dryden Vos.

Contispex I's ashes first appeared in the 2018 anthology film, Solo: A Star Wars Story, before being identified as Contispex I in the accompanying reference book, Solo: A Star Wars Story The Official Guide, written by Pablo Hidalgo. Contispex I was originally introduced in the Star Wars Legends continuity in the 2005 reference book The New Essential Chronology, written by Daniel Wallace.
